ProjectData.title: Movie Mania
ProjectData.headline: The Movie Mania Project
ProjectData.description: The Movie Mania Project was a front-end project. It was a group project completed by a team of four people. The project was developed using ReactJS and CSS. In addition to the front-end work, I added a Google login feature and linked a database to the page so users could save their favorite movies. The data we used for the project was gathered from the MovieDB API

ProjectData.title: Weather APP
ProjectData.headline: The WeatherApp Project
ProjectData.description: The WeatherApp Project was a front-end only project. I used HTML, CSS and JavaScript to develop it. The data for the project was gathered from the Open Weather API.

ProjectData.title: PokéDex
ProjectData.headline: The PokéDex Project
ProjectData.description: The PokéDex Project was a front-end only project.The project was carried out by a group of four people. We used ReactJS and CSS to develop the project. The data used in the PokéDex project was obtained from the Pokemon API.
